verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> upon a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines'<s%> <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is on the other <S%H4480>side.<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H1975><s%> But he <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3427>tarried<s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> a pomegranate <S%H7416>tree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H4051>Migron:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5973>with<s%> him were about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%>

And <S%H281>Ahiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> <S%H350>Ichabod's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> <S%H5375>wearing<s%> an <S%H646>ephod.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

And <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4569>passages,<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines'<s%> <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> there was a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> on the <S%H4480>one<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H5676><s%> and a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>rock<s%> on the <S%H4480>other<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H5676><s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H949>Bozez,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5573>Seneh.<s%>

The <S%H8127>forefront<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H4690>situated<s%> <S%H4480>northward<s%> <S%H6828><s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H4480>southward<s%> <S%H5045><s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1387>Gibeah.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised:<s%> it may be <S%H194>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>work<s%> for us: <S%H3588>for<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4622>restraint<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> by <S%H4592>few.<s%>

And his <S%H3627>armorbearer<s%> <S%H5375><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in thine <S%H3824>heart:<s%> <S%H5186>turn<s%> thee; <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H5973>with<s%> thee according to thy <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> will pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> these <S%H376>men,<s%> and we will discover <S%H1540>ourselves<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.

If <S%H518><s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us, <S%H1826>Tarry<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we <S%H5060>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> you; then we will stand <S%H5975>still<s%> in our <S%H8478>place,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.

But <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H3541>thus,<s%> Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> us; then we will go <S%H5927>up:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into our <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> unto us.

And <S%H8147>both<s%> of them discovered <S%H1540>themselves<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2356>holes<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they had hid <S%H2244>themselves.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4675>garrison<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and his <S%H3627>armorbearer,<s%> <S%H5375><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> us, and we will <S%H3045>show<s%> you a <S%H1697>thing.<s%> And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H3627>armorbearer,<s%> <S%H5375><s%> Come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> climbed <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and his <S%H3627>armorbearer<s%> <S%H5375><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him: and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan;<s%> and his <S%H3627>armorbearer<s%> <S%H5375><s%> <S%H4191>slew<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And that <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and his <S%H3627>armorbearer<s%> <S%H5375><s%> <S%H5221>made,<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> about <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> within as it were a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4618>acre<s%> of <S%H7704>land,<s%> which a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of oxen might plow.

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H2731>trembling<s%> in the <S%H4264>host,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people:<s%> the <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> and the <S%H7843>spoilers,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2729>trembled,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>quaked:<s%> so it <S%H1961>was<s%> a very <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H2731>trembling.<s%>

And the <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7200>looked;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> melted <S%H4127>away,<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> on beating <S%H1986>down<s%> one another.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H6485>Number<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> us. And when they had <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and his <S%H3627>armorbearer<s%> <S%H5375><s%> were <S%H369>not<s%> there.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H281>Ahiah,<s%> Bring <S%H5066>hither<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that the <S%H1995>noise<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H1980>on<s%> and <S%H1980>increased:<s%> <S%H7227><s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H622>Withdraw<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him assembled <S%H2199>themselves,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> against his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> and there was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>discomfiture.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> that <S%H1961>were<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H865>before<s%> that <S%H8032>time,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them into the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from the country round <S%H5439>about,<s%> even <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> turned to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan.<s%>

Likewise <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which had hid <S%H2244>themselves<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> even <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> followed <S%H1692>hard<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> <S%H1007>Beth-aven.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H5065>distressed<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H422>adjured<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%> that I may be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on mine <S%H4480>enemies.<s%> <S%H341><s%> So <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2938>tasted<s%> any <S%H3899>food.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> they of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H3293>wood;<s%> and there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H7704>ground.<s%>

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3293>wood,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1706>honey<s%> <S%H1982>dropped;<s%> but <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H5381>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7621>oath.<s%>

But <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> when his <S%H1>father<s%> charged the people with the <S%H7650>oath:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> wherefore he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> <S%H853>it<s%> in a <S%H3295>honeycomb,<s%> <S%H1706><s%> and <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H215>enlightened.<s%>

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H4480>people,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Thy <S%H1>father<s%> straitly charged the people with an <S%H7650>oath,<s%> <S%H7650><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> any <S%H3899>food<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5888>faint.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> My <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H5916>troubled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have been <S%H215>enlightened,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H2938>tasted<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

How much <S%H637>more,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H3588>haply<s%> <S%H3863><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> had eaten <S%H398>freely<s%> <S%H398><s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> of the <S%H4480>spoil<s%> <S%H7998><s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H4672>found?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> had there <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H6258>now<s%> a much <S%H7235>greater<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> among the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%>

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4480>Michmash<s%> <S%H4363><s%> to <S%H357>Aijalon:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5888>faint.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6213>flew<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H1121>calves,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> and <S%H7819>slew<s%> them on the <S%H776>ground:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> them <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in that they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1818>blood.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Ye have <S%H898>transgressed:<s%> <S%H1556>roll<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Disperse <S%H6327>yourselves<s%> among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Bring me <S%H5066>hither<s%> <S%H413><s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> them <S%H2088>here,<s%> and <S%H398>eat;<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H398>eating<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H1818>blood.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H3027>with<s%> him that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H7819>slew<s%> them <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> the same was the <S%H2490>first<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> that he <S%H1129>built<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H962>spoil<s%> them <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and let us <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of them. And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto thee. Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> Let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H1988>hither<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
